div.pre: 854 Mal√¢k Porovec, c. 85 km. E of Ruse, Bulgaria, 1963 Burial: c. 285-275 B.C. (T) Contents: 17+ AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 14 tetradr. Seleucus I: 3 tetradr. Disposition: Razgrad 7 Alexander, 1 Se- leucus; Sumen coll. 7 Alexander, 2 Se- leucus Gerasimov, BIAB 27 (1964), p. 242
